ygData.subject: Re: Spears and Darkmouse
ygData.msgSnippet: No, the transmission was at the Ark. Firearm is heading for the CF now, though, with Spears. ... Slayer nods, ready to fight. He looks out toward the Ark,

No, the transmission was at the Ark. Firearm is heading for the CF 
now, though, with Spears.

::Slayer::

Slayer nods, ready to fight. He looks out toward the Ark, eager to 
fight again.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon smiled.
> 
> "Our chip has over-powered the Maximal programming. When she comes 
> out of stasis, she will be ours again."
> 
> "But how do we get her out?" Blaze asked.
> 
> "That's where you come in. We will all turn our cloaks off, and 
> distract the Maximals by drawing them outside for a battle. 
> Meanwhile, you will still have your cloak on, and will enter the 
base 
> through a large panel that is missing on the other side of the ship 
> because of previous battles. When you find Spears, slap this cloak 
on 
> her and run back to base. We'll keep the battle up until you are at 
> the base. Put Spears in a holding cell until I get there, and if 
she 
> wakes tell her the Maximals did something evil to her and we must 
fix 
> it. Everyone understand? Good. We begin in 10 cycles. Everyone load 
> up!
